title: DevNaza
description: A personal developer portfolio built with React and Framer Motion, showcasing projects, skills, contact, responsive design, lazy-loaded sections, and smooth animations..

title: To-do List App
description: A simple to-do list application with features like adding, editing, and deleting tasks.

title: Task Management App
description: Taskly is a lightweight React/Vite task management app with Firebase auth, intuitive UI, task creation, sorting, notifications, and responsive sidebar.

title: Next Gen NFT Marketplace
description: A modern NFT marketplace platform built with React and Vite, featuring creator profiles, NFT collections, blog integration, and secure authentication system.

title: Maglo Finance Management Dashboard
description: A responsive and interactive finance dashboard for small businesses, featuring real-time invoice management, VAT calculations, authentication, and financial summaries with charts.
